title: My google pixel 3 requires a domain name to connect to a WiFi network (student dorm)
content:
I'm in a student dorm where we have a regular wifi but with a certain certificate which we need to access the network. But the problem lies in the phone for some reason, as of recently I can't connect to the WiFi network anymore because the phone requires now a DOMAIN for some reason, how can I remove this domain or how can I get the name of it? 
I'm really a big fan of this phone but because of this I'm thinking to switching over to an iPhone..
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
